text.div:
ProvenanceParticipantRole

The role that a provenance participant played

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/provenance-participant-role, which defines the following codes:

LvlCodeDisplayDefinitionComments
1enterer EntererA person entering the data into the originating systemThe data entry person is collected optionally for internal quality control purposes. This includes the transcriptionist for dictated text
1performer PerformerA person, animal, organization or device that who actually and principally carries out the activityDevice should only be assigned as a performer in circumstances where the device is performing independent of human intervention. Need not be the principal responsible actor
1author AuthorA party that originates the resource and therefore has responsibility for the information given in the resource and ownership of this resourceEvery resource should have an author
1verifier VerifierA person who verifies the correctness and appropriateness of activityThis is often used in association with the institution that hosts an activity. Verification and Authentication are synonymous
2  legal Legal AuthenticatorThe person authenticated the content and accepted legal responsibility for its content
1attester AttesterA verifier who attests to the accuracy of the resource
1informant InformantA person who reported information that contributed to the resourcee.g. a next of kin who answers questions about the patient's history
1custodian CustodianThe entity that is accountable for maintaining a true an accurate copy of the original recordThe responsibility for this may be assigned to someone else, but the accountability is not. Requests for copies of the records are directed to the custodian
1assembler AssemblerA device that operates independently of an author on custodian's algorithms for data extraction of existing information for purpose of generating a new artifact.
1composer ComposerA device used by an author to record new information, which may also be used by the author to select existing information for aggregation with newly recorded information for the purpose of generating a new artifact.

name: ProvenanceParticipantRole
description: The role that a provenance participant played

concept.definition: The entity that is accountable for maintaining a true an accurate copy of the original record
A device that operates independently of an author on custodian's algorithms for data extraction of existing information for purpose of generating a new artifact.

A device used by an author to record new information, which may also be used by the author to select existing information for aggregation with newly recorded information for the purpose of generating a new artifact.
